Process is supported by following version of Windows:
Windows 7 (SP 1)
Windows 8.1
Windows 10


open folder "Step 1"
choose your windows type 32 bit or 64 bit adn run file as per your windows type.

Python installation will start, click on add python to path. wait for the setup to finish.

After python installation finishes, Cmake installation will automatically start, click next, next,
then click on "add cmake to path for all users", click next and install it.

After Cmake is installed, Visual studio will automatically start, once it opens, click on "available" tab
and click "C++ desktop" and click install.

once it is finished, restart the system.


open folder "Step 2"
right click on "script.ps1" and click "run with powershell"
